release.change: Added auto sleep timer option
Added theme setting that follows the systems dark mode setting
Changed settings menu to easier find the settings
Fix for downloads to custom location being deleted as soon as they finish, on some devices you cant set custom location at the moment

App can now be sideloaded again

Removed background location usage for local network detection. For now you can switch between local and global network by using Toggle local network in the side bar. I am working on bringing back automatic detection for this.

Changed the versioning format. It is now following the standard (Month Date) . (release number this month). For example the current version is the second relase of mars 2020 so it is called 2003.2
If you click on a track that has a bookmark the app will now ask if you want to resume from that

If the app is signed by Popeen and sideloaded it will be locked down to demo only to encourage people to get it from Google Play or build it from source. The reason for this is that we don't want them using old versions of the app they downloaded from shady websites
